question: A flagstaff 17.5 m high casts a shadow of length 40.25 m. The height of the building, which casts a shadow of length 28.75 m under similar conditions will be:
answer_description: Let the height of the buildingxmetres.Less lengthy shadow, Less in the height (Direct Proportion)40.25 : 28.75::17.5 :x40.25 xx= 28.75 x 17.5x=28.75 x 17.540.25x= 12.5

question: In a camp, there is a meal for 120 men or 200 children. If 150 children have taken the meal, how many men will be catered to with remaining meal?
answer_description: There is a meal for 200 children. 150 children have taken the meal.Remaining meal is to be catered to 50 children.Now, 200 children120 men.50 children120x 50= 30 men.200

question: An industrial loom weaves 0.128 metres of cloth every second. Approximately, how many seconds will it take for the loom to weave 25 metres of cloth?
answer_description: Le the required time bexseconds.More metres, More time (Direct Proportion)0.128 : 25::1 :x0.128x= 25 x 1x=25=25 x 10000.128128x= 195.31.Required time = 195 sec (approximately).

question: 36 men can complete a piece of work in 18 days. In how many days will 27 men complete the same work?
answer_description: Let the required number of days bex.Less men, More days (Indirect Proportion)27 : 36::18 :x27 xx= 36 x 18x=36 x 1827x= 24.

question: 4 mat-weavers can weave 4 mats in 4 days. At the same rate, how many mats would be woven by 8 mat-weavers in 8 days?
answer_description: Let the required number of bottles bex.More weavers, More mats (Direct Proportion)More days, More mats (Direct Proportion)Wavers4:8::4 :xDays4:84 x 4 xx= 8 x 8 x 4x=(8 x 8 x 4)(4 x 4)x= 16.
